name: Minibeasts: Collectable Toys!
description:
Minibeasts is the ultimate toy collectable! Mix & match your toy parts to make amazing unique combinations! 36 parts to collect! 

Beat your friends in the Minibeasts game to take one of their pieces to add to YOUR collection!

Start the game with a base toy and three booster packs to get you started in the wonderful world of Minibeasts!

Balance your Minibeasts attacks (red, green, blue) to best your opponents corresponding defense, and vice versa!

CONTROLS:
W - Slam
A - Dodge
S - Uppercut
D - Punch

You can view your upcoming opponent's stats & Minibeast in the inventory/creator menu by clicking on your Minibeast/stats!

=============================================================

NOTE: This game was made for the LowRezJam 2021. The jam restricts participants to create a game in a max window size of 64x64. The chosen theme for the jam was "Minibeasts".
